content.title: Pentoxifylline
content.definition: Methylxanthine derivative that improves blood flow by increasing red blood cell deformability and decreasing blood viscosity, approved for treatment of intermittent claudication.

indications.approved: Intermittent claudication from chronic occlusive arterial disease

dosing.with_meals: Recommended to reduce GI side effects
dosing.renal_adjustment: May need dose reduction in CKD

efficacy.guideline_status: Weak recommendation, may be considered if cilostazol contraindicated

clinical_pearls: Modest benefit at best for claudication
